strapiPost.title: Berry Fest Around the Corner
strapiPost.content:
Bentonville's third annual Berry Fest is around the corner and tickets are on sale now.

  • Pick for a cause: Berry Fest is June 17-18 at the Help One Now berry farm. All proceeds from the festival will help support the non-profit's community care efforts and mission to equip children internationally "transition into adulthood successfully." 
  • Festivities: In addition to berry picking, there will be live music from local artists and several food trucks available . The event will go from 4-7p both days. Tickets are $25 for adults, $10 for youth under 18, and free for children under 5. 

For tickets and more information, click HERE.
